member.name: T:FYFY_plugins.MouseManager.MouseOver
member.summary: Component specifying that the mouse is over the GameObject.
member.remarks: Automatically added or removed by the relative component.

member.name: T:FYFY_plugins.MouseManager.MouseSensitive
member.summary: Component allowing GameObject to be sensitive to the mouse. Add automatically a component when the mouse points the GameObject.

remarks.para: This component works only on objects that aren't on Ignore Raycast layer and which have a collider marked as Trigger (with Physics.queriesHitTriggers true).
